summary: A documentary of the story behind Raiders of the Lost Ark: The Adaptation (1989).
cast: Chris Strompolos|Eric Zala|Jayson Lamb|Angela Rodriguez|Ernest Cline|Casey Dillard|James Donald|Rob Fuller|Francisco Gonzalez|Chris Gore|John E. Hudgens|Guy Klender|Harry Jay Knowles|Scott Lionberger|Michael Mobley|Ryan Pierini|Karl Preusser|John Rhys-Davies|Eli Roth|Mark Spain|Kurt Zala
title: Raiders!: The Story of the Greatest Fan Film Ever Made
